title: MA61021: Mathematical Logic - Quick Facts

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: voidProgramming Prolog - facts, simple queries, complex queries, rules, arithmetic operators, recursion, unification, lists, cut. Propositional logic - syntax, semantics, laws of deduction, normal forms, resolution, theorem proving, validity, soundness and completeness. First order logic - conversion of commonsense sentences into the language of first order logic, universal and existential quantifiers, syntax, terms of predicate, model theoretic semantics, Harbrand universe, normal form, unification, proof theory, mechanical theorem proving, incompleteness.
